outputs.output_descr: UN Peace-building Expert  to provide conflict sensitivity and prevention policy advice and ongoing analysis of the situation, including with regard to emerging issues, underlying causes, and opportunities for preventive action, to the UN Country Team. Support and promote mechanisms of joint UNCT conflict analysis and policy development taken the mandates of various UN organizations into account.UN Peace-building Expert to provide advice to UN organizations in relation to the implementation of joint conflict prevention, reconciliation and peace-building initiatives and programmes (e.g. 'Delivering as One', Immediate Response Facility  IRF of the Peace-building Fund, etc.); support the UNCT and individual UN organizations to mainstream conflict prevention and conflict sensitivity into their programming and strategies; Maintain high level relationships with Government counterparts on issues of conflict prevention to enhance national ownership of reconciliation and conflict prevention initiatives; enhance synergies between conflict prevention programmes of different UN organizations.
Surge Support Project for the Consultation and Prioritization of PBF peacebuilding priorities in Kyrgyzstan

project_descr: The key objective of the UN Peace-building Expert is to provide technical guidance to the UN system in Kyrgyzstan on programming and policy work.
project_title: UN Peace-Building Expert in the Kyrgyz Republic
